cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]United [/i]— Whenever this creature attacks with two or more tokens, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

CW02 crews vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.
{1}{W}: Untap CW02.

When Startouched Devout enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{1}{C}, {T}: Fragment Startouched Devout. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]

Lifelink
At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one artifact or colorless creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
When CW05 dies, create a 1/1 Human Noble creature token.
[i]United —[/i] Whenever this creature attacks with two or more tokens, CW06 gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. If {C} was used to pay this cost, put a stun counter on it.

Flying
Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time each turn, if it's not your combat phase, CW08 gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

When CW09 dies, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token. You gain 1 life.
• Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Extort [i](Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)[/i]
Whenever you extort, you gain 1 life.

Flying
Whenever Opalwing Cavalry attacks with one or more Vehicles, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens, then put a +1/+1 counter on each if you control a non-Construct token.
CW13 deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If {C} was paid to cast this spell and that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
Untap target creature. It gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn, then gets +1/+1 if it's a Vehicle.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its triggered abilities don't trigger.
When CW17 enters the battlefield, exile up to one target nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less until CW17 leaves the battlefield.

Autopilot {1}{W} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
CW18 gets +1/+1 and has lifelink if it wasn't crewed this turn.
Crew 1

Flash
When CU01 enters, target player mills the top card of their library.

Whenever CU02 crews a Vehicle, scry 2.
{3}{U}: Untap CU02.
Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell had {C} in its mana cost, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
{T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast Vehicle spells or activate abilities of Vehicles.

Flying, shroud
{2}{U}, {T}: Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

When Startouched Analyst enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}{C}, {T}: Fragment Startouched Analyst. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]
When CU07 enters, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. If you paid {C} to cast this spell, put two stun counters on it instead.
When the void calls, transform CU08. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
Ward {2}
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player mills two cards.

cards.rules_text: Counter target noncreature, nonartifact spell. Its controller investigates.

Choose one —
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Fragment target creature. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]

Target creature gets +1/-1 and can't be blocked this turn.
Draw a card.

Exile up to two target creatures or artifacts you control, then return them to the battlefield under their owner's control.
Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Draw two cards. Untap up to one target artifact.

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If the void called this turn, its controller puts it on the bottom of their library instead. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a colorless Clue artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.” It loses all other card types, creature types, and abilities.

Enchant creature
When CU16 enters the battlefield, investigate twice. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.

Whenever CU17 attacks, another target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Crew 2

Autopilot {1}{U} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
Zephyr Piercer gets +1/+1 and has flying if it wasn't crewed this turn.
Crew 1

When CB01 enters, each player discards a card.
When the void calls, you may put a deathtouch counter on CB01. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]

Flying, haste
Extort [i](Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)[/i]

When CB03 enters the battlefield, create a colorless 1/1 Eldrazi Scion creature token with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on CB03.

Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, each opponent loses 1 life.
{2}{B}: CB04 gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
When the void calls, Lamplight Stalker gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]

Extort [i](Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)[/i]
Whenever you extort, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Flash
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Create a tapped Treasure token.
When CB09 enters, create two black 1/1 Horror creature tokens with “When this creature is sacrificed, target player mills a card.”

When Startouched Assassin enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
{1}{C}, {T}: Fragment Startouched Assassin. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]

This spell costs {1}{B} less to cast if the void called this turn. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]
Destroy target creature.

Target opponent loses 2 life.
Whenever you discard a card, you may exile Too Quiet from your graveyard. When you do, target opponent loses 2 life.

Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains menace and “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.”
Draw a card.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Scry 1, then draw two cards.
Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life. If a token was sacrificed this way, create a colorless 1/1 Construct artifact creature token.
Mill up to two cards, then return two creature cards with total mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature.
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature you control died this turn, creatures your opponents control get -3/-3 until end of turn instead.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
When the void calls, enchanted creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]
Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.
The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.

Haste
Exile a card from your graveyard and sacrifice CR01: It deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever Hotwire Prodigy attacks with or crews a Vehicle, that vehicle gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {CR}. Spend this mana only to cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater.

Haste
Whenever a Vehicle you control attacks, if it wasn't crewed this turn, CR04 deals 1 damage to target player.

When CR05 enters, create a tapped Treasure token.
Whenever you expend 4, target creature gets +2/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. [i](You expend 4 as you spend your fourth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]

{1}{R}: Discard a card, then draw a card.
When the void calls, CR06 gains first strike until end of turn. [i](The void calls when the third card enters exile and/or your graveyard each turn.)[/i]

When Startouched Blitzer enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to its power.
{1}{C}, {T}: Fragment Startouched Blitzer. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if a Vehicle you control dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CR08.

Flying, haste
When CR09 enters, if you control another creature with mana value 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if the void called this turn.
Rend in Flame deals 3 damage to any target.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard any number of cards. This spell costs {2} less for each card discarded this way.
CR12 deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. If it's a Vehicle, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

Destroy target artifact. 
Create either a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token or a tapped Treasure token.
Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. If that creature has mana value 4 or greater, put a trample counter on it.

Enchant creature
When Mark of the Eye enters, discard a card, then draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +X/+0, where X is twice the number of cards you've discarded this turn.

Trample
{R}: CR17 gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Autopilot {1}{R} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
Task Force Hotrod gets +1/+1 and has menace if it wasn't crewed this turn.
Crew 1

CG01 gets +1/+1 as long as you control a token.
{2}{G}: Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[i]United — [/i]Whenever this creature attacks with two or more tokens, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.

When Startouched Arborist enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{C}, {T}: Fragment Startouched Arborist. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice one or more creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on CG04 and it gains trample until end of turn.

When CG05 enters, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice a Clue: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
CG06 enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if a creature you control died this turn.

When World Whisperer dies, put a deathtouch counter on target creature with power and toughness 1.
{5}{C}, {T}: Fragment target creature. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, if it's a land card, you may reveal it. If you do, CG08 gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Vigilance
[i]United — [/i]Whenever this creature attacks with two or more tokens, you gain 2 life.

Vigilance, reach
When CG10 enters, if it doesn't have the highest mana value among creatures you control, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

Trample
When CG11 enters, create either one 3/3 green Treefolk creature token or three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

cards.card_name: CG12 A Rumble In The Deep
cards.rules_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 6 or greater from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Destroy target artifact or enchantment. 
If this spell was cast during your turn, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more lands.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Fragment target creature with flying or reach. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]

Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on each token creature you control. If you've sacrificed a creature this turn, put two +1/+1 counters on each token creature you control instead.

Enchant creature
When CG18 enters, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.

Whenever CA01 deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles that many cards from the top of their library.
{3}: CA01 gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Menace
Whenever you fragment a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on CA02.
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each colorless nonland permanent you control.
Fragment target creature. [i](Create a token that's a copy of it and put a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]
Exile target nonland permanent.

Autopilot {R} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
Whenever CA08 deals combat damage to a player, if it wasn't crewed this turn, it deals 1 damage to any target.
Crew 1

Autopilot {2} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
Haste
Crew 2

When Corrupted Hedron enters, investigate.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

Whenever this Vehicle attacks alone, it gains trample until end of turn.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Choose one. If {C}{C} was paid to cast this spell, instead choose two —
• You draw two cards and gain 2 life.
• Fragment up to two target creatures with total mana value 6 or less.
• Counter target spell.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The crown was laid on Zaila's head, and Goldport's last defenses fell.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. Then if the void called this turn, that opponent discards a card.

When Obsessive Ritualist enters, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
As long as the void called this turn, Obsessive Ritualist gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch and haste.
{T}: Add one mana of any type. Until end of turn, when you expend 4, untap Restless Summoners. [i](The types of mana are {C}, {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, and {G}.)[/i]

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it's a token, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[i]United [/i]— Whenever this creature attacks with two or more tokens, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

Extort
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack you, and can't block if its controller lost life this turn.

Autopilot {2}{R}{W} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
Whenever Stormqueller Galleon attacks, if it wasn't crewed this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it. It gains first strike and menace until end of turn.
Crew 2

Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Trample
Whenever you sacrifice a creature you control to pay the cost of a spell or ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Sludge Trawler.

Admired Aeronaut crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a Vehicle crewed by Admired Aeronaut, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Activated abilities of artifacts you control cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana you pay to activate an ability to less than one mana.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter or a trample counter on target creature you control.
